name: Forsaken Temple (Prototype)
description:
In The Forsaken Temple world, explore the vast lands of Amazonia and its forgotten secrets. Uncover the ancient artefacts which are scattered across the lost city of Machu Picchu. Get across steep cliffs, narrow valleys, mysterious caves, and fast tide rivers of the jungle. Leading you to the uncharted ruins and the forsaken temple of Machu Picchu where a complex path must be chosen to find the last artefact of the city. 

W - Sprint

A, S, D - Left, back, right

Space - jump 

ctrl - Crouch

Shift - Walk

W + Ctrl - Slide 

E - dash 

Left click - swinging 

Right click - grappling

W + A or D depending where the Wall = Wall run

W + in front of wall - Wall Climb

Space + Space - Double jump
